product_name: KissimPRESS Falsies Press On Self Adhesive Voluminous Lash Clusters Kit
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLash in a flash with NO GLUE NEEDED - Just Press On & GO! KISS imPRESS Falsies Press On Self Adhesive Voluminous Lash Clusters Kit, for effortless beauty & a natural, clean look with no damage to natural lashes. The first ever press on under lash application.
details: DetailsFeaturesEasy, quick under-lash applicationNo damage to natural lashesExclusive self-stick technology adheres instantlyErgonomically designed, nonstick applicatorIncludes36 natural volume 12mm-14mm pre-bonded false eyelashesNonstick ApplicatorPackaging may varyItem 2604624How To UsePluck a cluster from the tray.Place the cluster underneath your natural lashes.Squeeze clusters and natural lashes together with the applicator.How to Remove: With clean hands, use your finger to remove the clusters by gently lifting them off, starting with the band side.Precautions: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.IngredientsRosin (Colophonium, Colophane), Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polyethylene Terephthalate.
how_to_use: Pluck a cluster from the tray.Place the cluster underneath your natural lashes.Squeeze clusters and natural lashes together with the applicator.How to Remove: With clean hands, use your finger to remove the clusters by gently lifting them off, starting with the band side.Precautions: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.

reviews.headline: Lashes
reviews.comments: Advertises for 36 but i only got 20. The store associate didnt wanna help.

reviews.headline: I will continue to purchase this product!
reviews.comments: ‚ô•Ô∏è it! And I have already recommended it to my family and friends?

reviews.headline: Survived a day at a theme park with all of my lashes
reviews.comments: I spent the entire day riding rides at Hersheypark. Sitting front row on the roller coasters. I still have all of my lash clusters. Didn't lose a single one!!

reviews.headline: Hands Down the Best Eyelash Extension Replacement
reviews.comments: If I could rate this product more, I would one hundred percent. I'm on my 30+ buy of these voluminous eyelashes and there's no stopping anytime soon. They are user friendly, look amazingly close to normal extensions and don't rip out my natural lashes

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Stays on and easy to apply

reviews.headline: Will be repurchasing forever!
reviews.comments: I was so sure I would hate these. Boy was I wrong. I was tired of spending $250 on lash extensions (yes, really!) and strip lashes always looked terrible on me. Having Asian lashes has always made eye makeup hard for me, but these are such a game changer. They take 5 minutes to apply, and I was even able to put them on during my lunch break in the break room when I realized I had an event after. The best part? They look JUST like a fresh fill on my lash extensions, down to the length and curl and everything. The only critique I have is that a couple of lashes in the box weren't sticky and I had to throw them away. Also, they're def single use and not reusable. Overall, I recommend this for all my ABGs and I will be repurchasing these forever < 3

reviews.headline: Soooo good!
reviews.comments: I use to get volume eyelash extensions all the time and these took no time at all! They are way easier than false eyelashes with your own glue

reviews.headline: Apply before skincare!!!!
reviews.comments:
These are only effective if your face/eyes are clean and dry. 
I apply these lashes before my skincare so they can stick to my eye before all the oils and moisturizers of my skincare prevent the lash from adhering to my lash line. Very user friendly.

reviews.headline: Packaging Changed Not the Same
reviews.comments: I have bought this product many times because I loved them! I recently bought some new ones and noticed the packaging looked different. They don't really stick well anymore (it now has this weird strip) and are flaky (which was never an issue before). In my opinion, they have completely changed them for the worse. Hopefully it can be fixed because they were truly so great.

reviews.headline: Nice lashes for first timers
reviews.comments: Easy to apply, easy to remove and if you are careful - they are pretty much reusable for at least 3 wearings (at least for me they were).  I like them and will continue to buy.

reviews.headline: BUY RIGHT NOWWWW
reviews.comments: I loveeeee these!! I cant put on strip lashes to save my life. These individual bundles are so easy to use! I was done in 10 min!! They're full and wispy, but not over the top! I really like these. Perfect for going out or casual daily life. So far these have lasted 4 days without coming off! I do not get them wet in the shower and that's probably why they've lasted so long. I just wash my face with a wash cloth when I get out so I can control how wet they get. 10/10 GET THEM!!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Best lashes ever‚Ä¶so easy to use. Perfect for beginners but fabulous enough for anyone

reviews.headline: Does not stick
reviews.comments: I never write reviews but these are the worst lashes ever. They would not stick whatsoever and fell off before I left for my event

reviews.headline: Love them!
reviews.comments: At first I had a hard time because I've never tried these adhesive clusters, but once I got the hang of them I'm hooked. They look gorgeous and are super comfortable I forgot I had lashes on. I'm definitely going to buy more and stock up

reviews.headline: They're really good
reviews.comments: These press on lashes wee really good, i had a bit of a hard time putting them on for the first time but my second try was easier since i found out it was allof easier to put in with some mascara but unfortunately im someone who suffers from blepharitis and its only been twice since i wore them that i noticed it kinda triggered my blepharitis. Its not that bad of a reaction but im a little discouraged since ive been wanting wear lashes again without having an allergic reaction. But other than that theyre really good press on lashes, they arent as full as the lashes im used to wearing but they still look really nice on the eyes. I just dont know how to wash off my eye makeup without accidentally getting them off.

reviews.headline: It doesn't work
reviews.comments: I tried multiple times and itndoesnt stick. It keeps falling off. Save your money and pay gor the lash extension instead.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: I love these lashes. They go on easy, and did not irritate my eye. I receive compliments every time I wear them. I usually add the shorter on closest to my inner corner followed by two strips after and it gives me enough coverage.

reviews.headline: Still allergic
reviews.comments: I loved them. They went on so easy and look great. They lasted all day. But by the end of the night my lids got swollen. This the 2nd time and i found out im allergic to them

reviews.headline: Did not work
reviews.comments: These did not stick to my lashes at all. The applicator tool doesnt grip the lashses well. Also, the lash clusters are all the same length which is not ideal for natural-looking lash extensions. Not a single part of this product was good.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: did not expect to love these lashes as much as I do! I usually use another brand that is extremley expensive but I most definetly will be using these now!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
Let me start by saying: I am not an everyday lash wearer. I usually only wear the full band lashes for special occasions ‚Äî date nights, weddings, holiday parties, things like that. And even then, I'm not an expert. Just to give you an idea: I only learned a year or two ago that people actually apply lashes under their lash line! I had always applied them above, so that tells you my experience level üòÖ

Now, let's talk about these Impress Falsies Self-Adhesive Eyelashes.

Hands down, what I love most is no glue involved. Seriously, finding the right glue, waiting for it to get tacky (but not too dry), and then dealing with the mess if it gets anywhere else ‚Äî it's just chaos. But with these? They're already sticky! You literally just peel and apply. Chef's kiss. I want to kiss the hand of whoever invented these.

That said, when I was removing the lashes from the packaging, some came off super easily and others were a bit stuck, which made me nervous about accidentally tearing them. Thankfully, I didn't. The included tool is okay ‚Äî it does the job, but honestly, I found it easier to just use my fingers for placement. With a little more practice, though, I feel like I'll get the hang of it and make the application look seamless.

If you look at my photos, you'll see they already look pretty invisible, but I can tell on one eye you can still slightly see where I placed them. I really think with a little more practice, I could get them to look flawless.

I got the medium-long lashes, and for my smaller, hooded eyes, I found that two clusters on the outer corners were perfect. I tried adding a third cluster on one eye, but it felt like too much for me. Keeping it to just two gave me that wispy, cat-eye effect that I love. Plus, it really suits my eye shape!

What I also love is how lightweight they feel. On the eye where I applied them just right, I honestly don't feel them at all ‚Äî I don't see them, I don't feel them, nothing. On the other eye, where I didn't place them quite as well, I do feel them a little bit and can see them slightly, but that's on me. The better you apply them, the better they feel! üòç

Another thing: even when I'm not wearing makeup (like in the photos), these lashes make me feel alive and put together. As a busy mom who doesn't always have time to do a full face, these are game changers. I might just become an everyday lash girly because of them! ü§≠

And removal? So easy. Unlike full band lashes with glue, where taking them off at the end of the day feels like taking off your bra (you know the feeling!), these peel off easily with no mess.

In short: I love these lashes. They're quick, easy, and beginner-friendly, and they make me feel beautiful without the usual hassle. Highly recommend! If I can do it, anyone can hehe
faceoff_positive.headline: Where Have These Been My Whole Life?!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was sent the imPRESS Falsies self-adhesive eyelashes in exchange for my review. I never wear false eyelashes so this was a new try for me. This product comes with a metal eyelash applicator that seems to be of pretty good quality. However when trying to pluck an eyelash from the tray, I found it tricky to hold because the clamps don't meet together well enough. Could be a slight defect with my product. Also these eyelashes are advertised to not need any glue so I applied directly under my natural eyelashes as directed. Perhaps this would be easier for someone more experienced in applying these but I struggled to put these on and make sure they stuck well under my eyes. Eventually I got them on and loved the look, even if just applying on the outer edge of my eyes. It adds a nice subtle touch to your look. Once finished, I moved on with my day working around the house. It happened to be a very windy day and while outside working in the yard, I felt one come loose and had to go back to a mirror to correct it. I don't trust that these eyelashes will stick very well as you go throughout your day and found that they come off way too easily for my trust issues. When removing them, they came off very easily as I expected. However, I would like them to stick a little better so they don't come off before I want them too. It seems like they will last for a few re-stickings though but the quality of the self-adhensive will lessen as you do this. As for my final thought, I'm on the fence about these. If you love false eyelashes, I would definitely give these a try. They are very easy to apply once you figure it out. However, if you're a newbie to falsies like me, I would probably just skip it and stick with mascara.
faceoff_negative.headline: Easy to use but easy to lose!

rollup.name: imPRESS Falsies Press On Self Adhesive Voluminous Lash Clusters Kit
